title: Can't Install League on Windows 10
body: Recently got a new desktop and tried to install league but whenever the installer reaches the part with the Microsoft visual I get error code 1935, Does anyone know how to fix this I really just want to play a game {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
The MS Visual 1935 install error is generally caused by missing assets that League relies on. This can typically be resolved by updating windows or uninstalling all current versions of Microsoft Visual C++ 2005, then installing a fresh copy from [this link](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).

Let me know if this worked.
